comment_data.body:
I've managed to get this working. It turns out bicepparam files _are_ supported, they're just not captured under the bicep file type.
To fix this, I've added the following autocmd to my config:

```lua
local autocmd = vim.api.nvim_create_autocmd
local augroup = vim.api.nvim_create_augroup

local general = augroup("General Settings", { clear = true })

autocmd("BufEnter", {
  pattern = "*.bicepparam",
  callback = function()
    vim.bo.filetype = "bicep"
  end,
  group = general,
  desc = "Set bicepparam filetype to bicep",
})
```

And so far so good. All syntax highlighting looks correct.

title: Support for the bicepparam file extension
